title: Short Ghost and Horror Story Collection Vol. 018
creator: Various
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
description: LibriVox recording of Short Ghost and Horror Story Collection Vol. 018 A collection of twenty stories featuring ghoulies, ghosties, long-leggedy beasties and things that go bump in the night. Expect shivers up your spine, the stench of human flesh, and the occasional touch of wonder. For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording. For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org. M4B format available
subject: LibriVox; audio book; fiction; Horror/Ghost stories; Horror; Ghost
